stage4
Class Manager

java.lang.Object
  stage4.Manager

public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object

The Manager Class Reads the text file Competitordetails.txt and Writes a report to Final Report.csv

Constructor Summary
Manager()
          Manager Class Constructor runs the reallAllComp method from the Competitor List Class to read Competitors from the textfile("competitordetails.txt")
